column1: Tauremorna is one of the names of the Fangorn Forest
column2: used by Treebeard in his song In The Willow-meads Of Tasarinan. The other names mentioned by Treebeard are Ambaróna and Aldalómë.

column1: J.R.R. Tolkien notes in his Index questions that tauremorna means "black forest"
column3: p. 385 likely composed of Quenya taure ("forest") + morna ("dark
